===================================================

Definitioner

===================================================

adsmtag.define('def-lb1', {
	path: '/5706918/cinemazone.dk_dsk_lb1_skn',
	size: [
		[[930, 600] ,[[ 930, 180], [930, 600]]],
		[[0, 0],[]]
	],
	inview: [],
	refresh: 0
});

});
